about_the_game:
The original game soundtrack includes 5 completely original tracks, plus 3 additional songs from different artists that are playable on the Stereo device in-game.

Soundtrack List


01 - Shrouded Thoughts - Lucas Hoffmann
02 - Ice Cream of Magic - Bruno Piazza
03 - The Price of Progress - Lucas Hoffmann
04 - Nothing is Ever Lost - Perpetual Symphony
05 - Domain of Solitude - Lucas Hoffmann
06 - All Good Things Come to an End - Lucas Hoffmann
07 - Brain Machine - Xornotor
08 - Sunset Valley - Bruno Piazza
